param.name: jpg_quality_admin
param.label: JPG quality in admin panel (0-100%)
param.description: All jpg\'s in admin panel will be sent to output with this quality level.

param.name: images_filetypes
param.label: Images filetypes
param.description: List of files extensions treated as images. Please separate with spaces.

param.name: docs_filetypes
param.default: pdf doc zip xls ppt sxw
param.label: Documents filetypes
param.description: List of files extensions treated as documents. Please separate with spaces.

param.name: max_upload_size
param.label: Maximum upload size
param.description: Maximum upload size in bytes. Default: 2097152 bytes = 2048 Kb = 2 MB

param.name: root_directories
param.label: Root directories for Media Manager
param.description: Root directories for Media Manager, default: mamboroot/images amd mamboroot/media. Please separate with spaces.
